name: vuejs-gilt
description: Materials for Vue.js presentation at Gilt Architecture Council - Fall 2017

scripts.help: npm run help:sync; npm run help:commit; npm run help:test
scripts.help:sync: echo "npm run sync - to pull and push commits"
scripts.help:commit: echo "npm run commit - to add and commit all changes"
scripts.help:test: echo "npm test - to run spell check"
scripts.sync: git pull wiki master; git push wiki master; git pull origin master; git push origin master
scripts.commit: git add .; git commit -m "Commit from local"
scripts.pub: git subtree push --prefix presentation origin gh-pages
